mapper.select: SELECT sc_seq, sc_stnum, ST.st_name sc_stname, sc_sbcode, SB.sb_name sc_sbname, sc_sbscore FROM tbl_score SC LEFT JOIN tbl_student ST ON SC.sc_stnum = ST.st_num LEFT JOIN tbl_subject SB ON SC.sc_sbcode = SB.sb_code ORDER BY sc_stnum, sc_sbcode
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_score SET sc_stnum= #{sc_stnum}, sc_sbcode= #{sc_sbcode}, sc_sbscore= #{sc_sbscore}, WHERE sc_seq = #{sc_seq}
